text: Ambrose of Dorostol (born Alexander Alexandrov Parashkevov; 9 June 1942 â€“ 18 August 2020) was a Bulgarian Orthodox clergyman. He was the Bishop of Branitsa from 1998 to 2010 and Metropolitan of Dorostol from 2010 to his death in 2020. He was a member of the Bulgarian Orthodox Church. Dorostolski died from COVID-19 on 18 August 2020 in Silistra at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bulgaria Category:Eastern Orthodox bishops Category:Bulgarian people
title: Amvrosius Parashkevov
